name: Doors & Rooms - Gym
description:
After few hours on spinning bike you discover that you are locked in the top class private gym... and you have no keys.
Find your way out by solving mini-puzzles, combining items and using your smartphone's magic!
Escape before you turn into Arnold Schwarzenegger...
Features
Challenging logic puzzles
Beautiful graphics

How to play
Find and use items
Solve mini-puzzles
Fun extras (tilting and shaking)
